name: storefront_backend
description: The application uses of the following libraries: - Postgres for the database - Node/Express for the application logic - dotenv from npm for managing environment variables - db-migrate from npm for migrations - jsonwebtoken from npm for working with JWTs - jasmine from npm for testing

scripts.test: set ENV=test db-migrate --env test up && ts-node node_modules/jasmine/bin/jasmine && db-migrate db:drop test

author: Udacity
